Debrief: Local Skopje pharmacy chain offering late‑hours access and a convenient e‑shop for mother & baby, cosmetics, supplements, and everyday OTC needs.
CompanySize_Employees: Estimated 20–40 employees based on 4+ branches and extended shifts listed on store pages

Research_Sources.description: Official e‑shop: products, store list, hours
Branch addresses, phones, and working hours

CoreOffering_Summary: Neighborhood pharmacies with late‑hours coverage in central Skopje supported by an e‑shop across OTC, supplements, cosmetics, and baby products.
KeyProducts_Medications: OTC decongestants, analgesics, vitamins, dermo‑cosmetics, baby supplies; in‑store Rx dispensing as regulated.
KeyServices_HealthcareSupport: In‑pharmacy counselling, extended opening hours, phone support, online browsing/ordering.
Technology_Use_In_Pharmacy: Basic e‑commerce catalog and branch info; no public evidence of telepharmacy or AI.
